tool.name: ClustToGFF
tool.description: add clusters locations into GFF files to be integrated into a genome viewer
tool.command: unzip '${gffdir}' -d gff && mkdir "outputdir" && LXClust2Gff gff/* outputdir '${clustersfile}' && mv *.gff outputdir/ && zip -r outputdir2 outputdir/* && mv outputdir2.zip '${gfffiles}'

param.name: gffdir
param.label: GFF files repository
param.help: Zipped repository containing all organism GFF files

tool.help:
**Description**
ClustToGFF : run LXClust2Gff from the "peptimapper" docker. ClustToGFF adds clusters locations, generated by PepMatch, into GFF annotation files to be integrated into a genome viewer.
**Integrated by**
Laetitia Guillot Cloarec PROTIM Biogenouest proteomics Core Facility, Rennes July,2017
